subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: A day after insisting she was still the best player in the world despite falling from No. 1 in the rankings, Serena Williams lost to 20th-ranked Patty Schnyder in her first match at the Italian Open. Williams appeared to move with difficulty during her 6-2, 2-6, 6-1 loss on the clay at the Foro Italico in Rome. It was the first clay-court event of the season for Williams.
